abstract: A federal judge in San Jose has given preliminary approval to a $14 million settlement of shareholder claims over backdating of stock options against current and former Apple executives, court documents showed.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge in San Jose has given preliminary approval to a $14 million settlement of shareholder claims over backdating of stock options against current and former Apple executives, court documents showed.

abstract: Microsoft continues to press its Zune line, despite being trounced in the market by Apple. Babies are born every day that don’t yet have iPods, the company says hopefully.
snippet: Microsoft continues to press its Zune line, despite being trounced in the market by Apple. Babies are born every day that don’t yet have iPods, the company says hopefully.
